name: Jace
initialDescription:
You meet Jace while on a walk past the laundrette, he has the appearance of a nobel gentleman.
He's currently walking his dog, as he walks past you, you realise now is your chance!
endDescriptionBad: Jace's dog doesn't like you one bit! It bites your leg!
endDescriptionGood: Jace asks if you want to join him tomorrow while he walks his dog, tomorrow!

dialogue.promptText: Kick the dog, it looked at you funny
Good Thanks, don't pet the dog

dialogue.whatHappensText: What does it look like... I'm walking my dog
What? How's that any of your business
dialogue.promptText: What do you do for a living

dialogue.whatHappensText: :), (The dog likes you, and so does Jace)

dialogue.promptText: There's a festival going on right now, maybe we could go together?
